ground truth: * Fix #201: handle ‎/‏ marks mid-text within stressed tags or right after stressed tags.
target descr: * Fix #201: handle ‎/‏ marks mid-text within stressed tags or right after stressed tags.

target descr: * Feature #213: ``images_as_html`` config option to always generate an ``img`` html tag. preserves "height", "width" and "alt" if possible.

commit message: Add a __main__.py file to the package
ground truth: * Add ``__main__.py`` module to allow running the CLI using ``python -m html2text ...``.
target descr: * Add ``__main__.py`` module to allow running the CLI using ``python -m html2text ...``.

commit message: Remove unused unescape() function and related support code
ground truth:
* Remove unused or deprecated:
	* ``html2text.compat.escape()``
	* ``html2text.config.RE_UNESCAPE``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.replaceEntities()``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.unescape()``
	* ``html2text.unescape()``
target descr:
* Remove unused or deprecated:
	* ``html2text.compat.escape()``
	* ``html2text.config.RE_UNESCAPE``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.replaceEntities()``
	* ``html2text.HTML2Text.unescape()``
	* ``html2text.unescape()``

commit message: fix the test failures on windows/cygwin due to
ground truth: * Fix #160: The html2text tests are failing on Windows and on Cygwin due to differences in eol handling between windows/*nix
target descr: * Fix #160: The html2text tests are failing on Windows and on Cygwin due to differences in eol handling between windows/*nix

commit message: adds support for "700", "800", and "900" as bold style indicators
ground truth: * Adds support for numeric bold text indication in ``font-weight``, as used by Google (and presumably others.)
target descr: * Adds support for numeric bold text indication in ``font-weight``, as used by Google (and presumably others.)

commit message: Fix tests which broke on backward compatibility
ground truth: * Default image alt text option created and set to a default of empty string "" to maintain backward compatibility
target descr: * Default image alt text option created and set to a default of empty string "" to maintain backward compatibility

target descr: * <s>, <strike>, <del> now rendered as ~~text~~.

commit message: Add single line break configuration (use case: Evernote)
ground truth: * Feature #51: Add single line break option.      This feature is useful for ensuring that lots of extra line breaks do not end up in the resulting Markdown file in situations like Evernote .enex exports. Note that this only works properly if ``body-width`` is set to ``0``.
target descr: * Feature #51: Add single line break option.      This feature is useful for ensuring that lots of extra line breaks do not end up in the resulting Markdown file in situations like Evernote .enex exports. Note that this only works properly if ``body-width`` is set to ``0``.
